metadata.title: Create Your Blog with SvelteKit
metadata.excerpt: It's time to rewrite your blog in SvelteKit!

content:
Recently, SvelteKit is released in public beta. It's always better to learn with project. So this is such a starter project - creating a markdown based blog with SvelteKit.

Very Basic of SvelteKit

It's very recommended to read the doc first.

Read the markdown files

// [slug].json.js
import fs from 'fs';

export function get({ params }) {
  const { slug } = params;

  let data = fs.readSync(`src/posts/${slug}.md`);
  ...
}

Parse the markdown with remark

Rendered the generated html

<script context="module">
  export async function load({ page, fetch }) {
    const slug = page.params.slug;
    const post = await fetch(`/${slug}.json`)
        .then((r) => r.json());
    return {
      props: { post }
    };
  }
</script>

{@html post.content}

Tips

Some confusing errrors could be solved by moving the dependencies to devDependencies due to some bugs of Vite.
